SourceAnalyzer.Name: Custom RavenDB Rules
SourceAnalyzer.Description: Custom rules for the RavenDB code base

Rule.Name: TabsMustBeUsed
Rule.Context: Indentation by spaces is not allowed. Use tabs instead.
Rule.Description: Make sure the code is indented by tabs. You can use the "Productivity Power Tools" extension available via the VisualStudio Gallery, which allows you to check and fix the indentation when saving a source code document.
